named-native-query.name: Expense.getBreakdownByCategory
named-native-query.query:
SELECT SUM(expenses.cost) AS totalCost, parents.name AS category FROM expenses INNER JOIN items ON expenses.item_id = items.id INNER JOIN categories ON items.category_id = categories.id LEFT JOIN categories parents ON categories.parent_id = parents.id WHERE categories.parent_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY parents.id
UNION
SELECT SUM(expenses.cost) AS totalCost, categories.name AS category FROM expenses INNER JOIN items ON expenses.item_id = items.id INNER JOIN categories ON items.category_id = categories.id WHERE categories.parent_id IS NULL GROUP BY categories.id

named-native-query.name: Income.getIncomeByMonth
named-native-query.query: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month',incomes.received_at),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date, COALESCE(SUM(amount),0) AS amount FROM incomes GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC

named-native-query.name: Expense.getExpensesByMonth
named-native-query.query: SELECT to_char(date_trunc('month',expenses.bought_at),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date, COALESCE(SUM(cost),0) AS amount FROM expenses GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC
